title: Amazon Essentials Men's Slim-Fit Comfort Stretch Jeans (Previously Goodthreads)
description: SLIM FIT DESIGN: Our men's jeans offer slim fit through the hip and thigh, tapering at the leg, while sitting comfortably at the waist
ALL-DAY COMFORT: Crafted from a cotton-blend denim, these men's jeans offer a light stretch that allows for all-day comfort and a better overall fit
VERSATILE WEAR: These men's comfort stretch jeans combine style with functionality. The classic five-pocket design and comfort-stretch make them perfect for everyday wear and versatile styling
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made with a zippered fly and metal button closure, our jeans for men offer bartack reinforcements and rivets
EASY MAINTENANCE: Keep your men's stretch jeans looking great by hanging them to dry. This helps the stretch denim maintain its shape and fit

These jeans are designed with a slim fit through the hip and thigh and feature a tapered leg that sits comfortably at the waist. Crafted from a cotton-blend denim, these comfort stretch jeans offer all-day comfort and a superior fit. These men's slim fit jeans blend functionality and fashion, making them a versatile addition to any wardrobe. The jeans feature a classic five-pocket design, bartack reinforcements and rivets at the front hand pockets, a zippered fly, and a metal button closure. Be sure to hang these men's stretch jeans to dry, extending their garment life.
